QuestData.Title: Forces of Nature: Mountain Giants
QuestData.Description: The mountain giants are our most powerful allies of the forest. They're carved from the land itself.$B$BNot many of our enemies are willing to fight off a walking hillside. It only takes a few of these to turn the tide of a battle completely.$B$BThe mountain giants here have been afflicted by some illness lately, but I've seen a healthy group of them to the southwest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Jesana's Giant Call to rally 5 Mountain Giants.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent!$B$B$n, you've helped bolster our forces here, and you've saved many of these forest creatures from the Horde as well. With our army now ready, Feathermoon will stand against all threats, Horde or otherwise!$B$BOn behalf of Lady Feathermoon, I'd like to award you with this weapon, fit for a Sentinel.
